Expected result: The Welcome Back screen is shown.
The Ether balance is shown on the overview. The wallet address is shown on the overview. The selected network is Ethereum Mainnet.

Test steps: Switch networks to a test network.
Expected result: The Sepolia balance is shown on the overview. The wallet address is shown on the overview. The selected network is Sepolia.

Test steps: Open the test dapp in another tab.

Expected result: MetaMask popup with estimated gas fees, total fees appears.

Test steps: Proceed to confirm contract deployment and wait for the transaction to be confirmed.
Expected result: Contract deployment status on MetaMask Activity list displayed as "Confirmed". "Deposit" and 'Withdraw" buttons in the Piggy Bank Contract section of the test dapp are active, 'Contract status: deployed" is visible at the bottom of the section.
MetaMask popup  with estimated gas fees, total fees appears.

Notes: Click on the MetaMask logo or return to the MetaMask tab if the extension is in the expanded view mode.

Expected result: The "Deposit" transaction in "Pending" status is displayed.  The amount is shown in the activity list item.

Test steps: Allow some time for the transaction status to update to "Confirmed".
Expected result: The "Deposit" transaction in "Confirmed" status is displayed.  The amount is shown in the activity list item.
Notes: Waiting times may vary based on network conditions.

Test steps: Proceed to view the transaction on the block explorer.
Expected result: Block explorer opens in the new tab.
MetaMask popup  with estimated gas fees, total fees appears.

Notes: Click on the MetaMask logo or return to the MetaMask tab if the extension is in the expanded view mode.

Expected result: The "Withdraw" transaction in "Pending" status is displayed.  The amount is shown in the activity list item.

Test steps: Allow some time for the transaction status to update to "Confirmed".
Expected result: The "Withdraw" transaction in "Confirmed" status is displayed.  The amount is shown in the activity list item.
Notes: Waiting times may vary based on network conditions.

Test steps: Proceed to view the transaction on the block explorer.
Expected result: Block explorer opens in the new tab.
